definition: glucocorticosteroid (corticosteroid hormone secreted by the adrenal cortex)

pinyin: yan2 pi2 zhi4 lei4 gu4 chun2

sentences.english: The adrenocortical response appears to parallel the severity of the burn .
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺皮质反应与烧伤的严重性是平行的。

sentences.english: The effect ol' Liu Shen Wan (LSW) on the ultrastructure and function of the zonafasciculata of adrenal cortex was observed in this study.
sentences.chinese: 观察了六神丸对肾上腺皮质束状带形态与功能的作用。

sentences.english: Glucocorticoid plus CTX may be used to treat lupus-like hepatitis with caution.
sentences.chinese: 糖皮质激素联合CTX治疗狼疮样肝炎可以慎用。

sentences.english: Taste buds react to sweet, sour, salty, and bitter. Messages are sent from the taste buds to the areas in the cortex responsible for processing taste.
sentences.chinese: 信号会从味蕾传送到大脑皮质中负责处理味觉的区域。

sentences.english: Adrenal cortical hormone is effective in the treatment of HNL.
sentences.chinese: 肾上腺皮质激素在治疗HNL方面疗效满意。

sentences.english: Also, cold exposure markedly increased plasma cortisol and plasma catecholamines levels of rats.
sentences.chinese: 寒冷使动物血浆皮质醇和儿茶酚胺含量明显增加。

sentences.english: So I picked a smaller one: how does the cerebral cortex allow thoughts to become action?
sentences.chinese: 大脑皮质是怎样使思维变成动作的？

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the role of bovine cortical bone needle as an internal fixation material for the intraarticular fracture.
sentences.chinese: 目的了解牛皮质骨棒对动物关节内骨折的内固定作用。

sentences.english: Clinical analysis of 70 cases with chronic adrenocortical hypofunction.
sentences.chinese: 慢性肾上腺皮质功能减退症70例临床分析。

sentences.english: These patients in two groups were used glucocorticoids adequately in the meantime during petechiae appeared on patients' eyelids.
sentences.chinese: 在出现瘀斑后，两组均添加大剂量糖皮质激素。

sentences.english: Even the wrinkles or folds on a walnut are like the neo-cortex.
sentences.chinese: 连它上面的褶皱看起来也很像新皮质。

sentences.english: Occasionally the finger-shaped structure of the capsula with the cortex entered the medulla.
sentences.chinese: 有时部分被膜连同皮质一起呈指状伸入髓质内。

sentences.english: Moreover, the high phosphorus diets appeared the tendency of epiphyseal plate thickness and bone cortical thickness decreasing.
sentences.chinese: 高磷日粮呈现降低生长板和骨皮质厚度的趋势。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of glucocorticoids in the treatment of acute laryngitis in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析糖皮质激素在小儿急性喉炎中的治疗价值。

sentences.english: Is cortisol necessary for severe sepsis or septic shock?
sentences.chinese: 严重脓毒症及感染性休克时是否需用皮质醇？

sentences.english: An intraarticular corticosteroid injection was performed several months ago, with limited effect.
sentences.chinese: 几个月以前接受膝关节内注射皮质类激素，收效甚微。

definition: dermis (layer within the skin containing sense of touch)
texture of timber/quality of material/material (that sth is made of)
outer skin/surface/leather cover (of a book)/drum skin/leather upper (of a shoe)
